Title: Comparing Static Bug Finders and Statistical Prediction
Elements_risk_assessment:
git blame to identify the provenance of the lines where defects occurred with 
    options for detecting changes and moves, and whitespace insensitivity
UseOF-SZZ: to identify the source of the buggy lines.
Summary:
They evaluate these two disparate approaches on a similar footing.
    We use historical defect data to apprise the two approaches, compare them, and seek synergies.
Outcome:
under some accounting principles, they provide comparable benefits; they also find that 
    in some settings, the performance of certain static bug-finders can be enhanced using information pro-
vided by statistical defect prediction.
